jobs: FixBug: Fix email confirmation localhost URLs in production — confirmation emails contain localhost URLs from getAppUrl() defaulting to http://localhost:8888 when process.env.URL is not set
UpdateTests: Add tests for the email confirmation production URL fix — auth flows with email verification must have dedicated tests that run without IS_TEST bypass
UpdateRevisions: Record spec changes for email confirmation production URL fix
ResolveBug: Mark email confirmation localhost URLs bug as resolved
FixBug: Fix unpolished pages — forgot password and other pages have content flush against screen edges with no breathing room, need consistent padding/margin
UpdateTests: Update tests for page spacing/padding fix
UpdateRevisions: Record spec changes for page spacing fix
ResolveBug: Mark page spacing bug as resolved
DoDeploy: Deploy the app to production
